summary: A brief email from a U.S. Attorney's Office staff member, likely in the Southern District of New York, informing a colleague that Jeffrey Epstein has filed a notice of appeal regarding his bail determination. The email is dated July 23, 2019, shortly after Epstein's arrest.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email; has filed a notice of appeal of the bail determination against him.

events.title: Epstein files notice of appeal on bail
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein files a notice of appeal regarding the bail determination made in his case.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein filed a notice of appeal of his bail determination on or before July 23, 2019.
The communication originates from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, specifically the Chief of the Public Corruption Unit.
The email is dated July 23, 2019, which is during the period following Epstein's arrest earlier that month.
The document shows internal government communication regarding Epstein's legal maneuvers.
The location of the U.S. Attorney's Office is noted as 1 St. Andrew's Plaza.
